thread.title: Trump Warns That “Obamacare Will Explode” in Wake of Health Care Bill Failure
thread.title_full: Trump Warns That “Obamacare Will Explode” in Wake of Health Care Bill Failure

author: Wilmot Proviso
title: Trump Warns That “Obamacare Will Explode” in Wake of Health Care Bill Failure

organizations.name: wake of health care bill failure

text:
WATCH: Chuck Schumer Lays Out His “Reasons” for Opposing Gorsuch 
He also said that a lot of lawmakers didn’t support the American Health Care Act because they didn’t realize the benefits that would be realized in phases two and three of the plan, which would have likely increased competition. FULL REMARKS: @POTUS on the GOP health care bill, which has been pulled. https://t.co/XSqXSToBHV pic.twitter.com/RiIhIA7N35 
— Fox News (@FoxNews) March 24, 2017 
“And again, I think what will happen is Obamacare, unfortunately, will explode,” Trump said in his remarks . Advertisement - story continues below 
“It’s going to have a very bad year. Last year you had over a 100 percent increases in various places. In Arizona, I understand it’s going up very rapidly again, like it did last year. Last year, it was 116 percent. Many places, 50, 60, 70 percent, I guess it averaged — whatever the average was — very, very high . And this year should be much worse for Obamacare.” 
And this is going to be trouble for the Democrats — who, as Trump pointed out, “totally own it.” 
Trump said Americans should “remember this is not our bill, this is their bill. Now, when they all become civilized and get together, and try and work out a great health care bill for the people of this country, we’re open to it. We’re totally open to it.” 
This is the folly of the Democrats . They thought that this was a victory for them. In the end, though, this sticks America with Obamacare — again. This is the same bill that was a millstone around their neck in 2014 and 2016. Advertisement - story continues below
